resources.string: ofo is a global bike sharing platform and we want to make getting around your city more convenient, affordable and environmentally friendly. Drive less, ride more!
Reminder: Prepay card is not applicable for FREE WEEK auto-new. Credit or Debit card is welcome!
Sorry, we cannot process your request right now. Please try again later.
Network error. Please check your network and try again.
Automatic payment failed, please change the payment method or bind new bank card.
Your balance will be automatically recharged %1$s when it reaches %2$s.
Do you want to turn on auto-recharge?
With Auto-Recharge, your balance will be automatically recharged when it reaches %1$s. You can turn off Auto-Reload anytime.
Please pay the deposit instantly to resume service.
ofo pass is frozen as your deposit was refunded.
There is no ofo pass open in this city.
Your ofo pass has %1$s remaining days now!
Add a credit or debit card to enjoy more rides!
Before you can start riding, please add a payment method (credit/debit card) to your account.
To redeem your ofo Pass, please add a valid credit or debit card to your account.
Card upload error. Please check that the information you entered is correct!
Please turn on Bluetooth to unlock ofo.
Bike cannot be unlocked via Bluetooth. Please unlock it with the code.
Please grant ofo access to your camera to unlock a bike. You can check if camera permissions are on by going to \"Settings -> Privacy -> Camera\"
Allow ofo to access your camera
"Can't connect Scooter,Get close to the scooter,please"
A four-digit code on your credit card, you can find this on the front of your card.
A three-digit code on your credit card, you can find this on the back of your card.
You should be able to find this date on the front of your card, under the card number.
The card expiration date is on the front of the card under the card number.
This card is not supported. Please contact our customer service if you need help.
Are you sure you want to change your default payment method?
scooter for deployment must be charged to 95%
The CID is the grouped series of digits printed on the front of the card.
Please park in a safe, appropriate location accessible to other ofo riders, such as a designated bike parking space or an existing bike rack.
Your request has been accepted. One moment please.
Visit facebook.com/device and enter the code shown above.
Unexpected error while downloading an image.
To connect your account, open the Facebook app on your mobile device and check for notifications.
"You're in control - choose what info you want to share with apps."
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Please ensure the bike is securely locked.
Congratulations! Your free week is active
"Please let us know how we can improve our service. We'll review your message and get back to you as soon as we can."
"Please tell us how we can improve our service. We'll be in touch!"
This coupon can be used anytime before *
You’ve just received a * coupon for your next trip!
CVC length is not correct, please re-enter and try again
The CVV is a three-digit security code printed on the back of the card.
Sorry! We are unable to delete this card. Delete this card failed,Please try again later.
Are you sure you want to delete this card?
Are you sure you want to delete this card? This is currently your only payment method.
Are you sure you want to delete?
You can request a refund of your deposit at any time.
Deposit is required.You can refund anytime.
Enjoy more ofo rides with less money
Refund request has been submitted. Typically, it takes 2 - 15 business days for your funds to arrive in your account.
Thank you for being a loyal ofo rider!
"Transfer Deposit to Balance Earn More Benefits"
Do you know that you can transfer deposit to your balance and use it for rides and enjoy deposit-free status as a loyal rider?
Deposit waived as a loyal rider
A %1$s days ofo pass is in your wallet
Please enter a valid email address.
Please sign up with your personal email
Please make sure you’ve entered your email correctly.
Make sure to manually slide the lock closed before ending your trip.
Your ofo account is not connected to a Facebook account. You can sign into a Facebook account in the Settings menu.
In order to provide better service, we may need your telephone number
You will receive a bonus of %s and %s if you park in this area.
You will receive a bonus of %s if you park in this area.
We recommend parking in this area.
You will receive a bonus of %s and %s if you park near this location.
You will receive a bonus of %sif you park near this location.
We recommend parking near this location.
Find a E-Scooter from the app
gift your friend a free week
Unlimited free rides for a week
Location could not be obtained. Please grant ofo access to your location information.
Google location services are currently unavailable. Please install Google Play and Google Maps and try again.
How’s everything? Show your support by leaving us a positive review in the Google Play Store.
Please add the phone number of your new group pass member
You have added %1$s to your ofo group pass.
Your ofo group pass is ready to be shared. Add more people to your group pass and enjoy unlimited rides.
Your group pass should include more than 2 members.
"ofo group pass is only available to users who haven't subscribed any pass."
Do you want to remove this member from your ofo group pass?
Do you want to remove %1$s from your ofo group pass?
You have been given a ofo Group Pass, with unlimited monthly ride! Download the app and start riding today!
%1$s has invited you to join their ofo group pass. Download ofo now and start riding.
You’ve selected %1$s for %2$s. Your Group Pass will begin %3$s and will automatically renew until canceled. Your pass selection will be shared with your group member(s) upon confirmation.
You earned GSE from this trip!
Open the app and find all the ofo bikes around you.
Park the bike safely and legally, then push the lock down manually to end the trip.
Scan the QR code on the bike to unlock it and begin your trip.
Please enter your card Expiration Date
Please enter the correct card number
Invalid card number. Please enter a correct number and try again.
Make sure your phone number is entered correctly.
【ofo】Your friend just sent you 3 FREE ofo rides! To claim, please download the app here
To choose from your contact, turn on permissions in Settings
You shared free rides with friends !
"You shared free rides with friends! Don't forget to remind them to sign up and take a ride!"
To choose from your contact，turn on permissions in Settings
"When you connect your contacts,you can effortlessly select friends to invite to join ofo. For every friend who signs up and takes a ride, you'll earn 3 free rides!"
"I'm sending you 3 FREE ofo rides! To claim, please download the app here:"
Invite sent! You shared free rides with friends!
Remind your friends to sign up and redeem your invite code
ofo sends the invite SMS for you
Invite a friend to ofo and you’ll both get free rides!
"Invite friends to ofo. When they sign-up, you'll receive 3 free rides!"
Do you want to refund your deposit?
Please contact cs_sg@ofobike.com if you cannot end trip in parking spot
Know more about Regulatory Handling Fee
Unable to load the web page.
You can unlock the bike again with code if you locked accidentally
"Thanks for riding ofo! Don't forget to lock the bike."
Log out from your PayPal account?
Log in with your phone number
Unlock every corner of the world
"Your information will remain confidential, and will never be displayed or shared publicly."
I have read and agree to the ofo Policy
Enter the verification code sent to you at %1$s
You have %1$dm %2$ds to park in recommend parking area to avoid extra fee, there’s a QR code in each parking area, just scan it!
There’s an unpaid rebalancing fee due to your improper parking in %1$s.
You are not in the proper parking places.
Parked properly! Thanks for your contribution to make our city clean.
Please DO NOT PARK in the Restricted Parking Zone (Red Zone), either you will be charged if there is any cost caused by the bike. Moreover, please mind locking the bike.
Make sure the lock is closed after ending your trip
Manually slide the lock closed to end your trip. It’s that easy.
Map failed to load. Please try again.
You can store up to five payment methods. Please delete a payment method before adding a new one.
Please enter a valid phone number.
To purchase ofo pass with auto-renewal function, please bind an usable card to your account
To ride an ofo bike, add a credit or debit card to your account.
For your paying convenience, you’ll need to add a payment method prior to your next trip.
Use the code to unlock the bike
Enter the number of the bike you want to use
Get the lock code for the bike
"You’ve received a coupon from us! For a limited time only, we are offering one free ride coupon for every trip you complete."
This is the Last page,There is no data!
"Steer clear. Parking is prohibited in this area. Repeat offenses may lead to suspension."
Sorry. This version of ofo is not supported in your area.
"ofo does not have permission to access your camera. Please grant ofo camera access in your system settings."
"ofo does not have permission to access your location. Please grant ofo location access in your system settings."
ofo does not have permission to read your phone status. For full app functionality, please grant ofo phone status permission in your system settings.
Subscribe and get your first week for free!
Join ofo pass to enjoy unlimited rides
Subscribe now and unlock unlimited rides!
Top up and enjoy per rides
Get extra bonus and enjoy more rides!
To ensure a better riding experience, please choose a plan.
Please park at parking spot near your destination to keep Singapore beautiful
You are parking the bike in designated area
You are parking outside of the designated bike sharing areas
Park here to keep our city beautiful and avoid extra fee
Please park at parking spot near your destination to keep Singapore beautiful!
Park in parking spot to avoid <font color=#f12745>%1$s extra Regulatory Handling Fee</font>
Do you want to subscribe to a %1$s ofo pass for %2$s? Your subscription will start on %3$s.This subscription will be automatically renew until canceled.
Discount price is only available for the first purchase.
Do you want to subscribe to a %1$s ofo pass for %2$s? Your subscription will start on %3$s after your free week ends.This subscription will be automatically renew until canceled.
If you cancel,your current subscription will continue until it expires on %1$s
Are you sure you want to cancel？Click “STAY” to redeem a %1$s off coupon towards your next month’s auto-renewal pass. One time offer!
"WAIT！We've got this special offer just for you!"
Do you want to subscribe to a %1$s ofo pass for %2$s? This subscription will be automatically renew until canceled.
Do you want to subscribe to a %1$s ofo pass for %2$s?
Do you want to subscribe to a %1$s ofo pass for %2$s? Your subscription will start on %3$s.This subscription will be automatically renew until canceled.
Sorry, the payment method you selected needs rebinding at the moment, would you like to rebind now?
Select the payment method you want to add
Our app requires %1$s access to function normally. Please enable %2$s services in Settings.
Try again. Make sure your phone has a working Internet connection.
Please grant ofo access to your photos. You can check if photo permissions are on by going to \"Settings -> Privacy -> Photos\"
Please turn on GPS to ride your ofo bike.
Please take a picture of the broken part.(Required)
For a limited time, ofo is offering a %1$s coupon for every trip completed.
To unlock the bike faster, please enable Bluetooth.
ofo needs to use your camera to provide the best user experience!
ofo requires location permissions in order to track your route.
ofo needs access to your photo library.
If the QR code is damaged, you can input the ID of the QR code. If the ID is also missing, please take a picture to show how you park properly
Take or upload photo of QR code(Required)
You will no longer have unlimited rides. Please stay with us!
Are you sure to quit from group pass?
Riding bike out of ofo operational area. Extra %1$s Regulatory Handling Fee could be added to you trip cost.

"Riding bike out of ofo operational area. Extra %1$s Regulatory Handling Fee could be added to you trip cost.
The charge will be waived if you ride any bike back in within %2$s."
"Please use ofo service inside of green zone"
You have redeemed %1$s ofo pass. Your subscription will start on %2$s. This subscription will be automatically renewed until canceled.
After you refund your deposit, you cannot ride ofo bikes anymore, are you sure to refund?
Deposit Refund Application submitted successfully, please be patient, the deposit will be returned ASAP once approved.
Please select a reason for the deposit refund request.
Thanks for staying ! Your ofo pass coupon has been deposited into your account.
3 extra days has been added to your pass.
Are you sure you want to cancel your ofo pass? We’ll give you an extra 3 days of unlimited rides if you stay.
Uh oh — it looks like your payment failed. It’s time to add a new card to ofo.
To continue enjoy unlimited ofo rides, please add a new card.
Uh-oh it looks like your renewal payment failed. Your ofo Pass will expire within 3 days.
You have successfully renewed your ofo Pass!
Please confirm that you would like to cancel your ofo Pass for %1$s for %2$s.
Please do not exceed the 140-character limit.
"We'll review your report and repair the bike."
What problems have you encountered with this bike?
Please select a reason for this report
"Thank you for your report. Please lock the bike and we will take care of the rest."
The request timed out. Please try later.
You can only reserve or use one bike at a time.
You can reserve a bike for up to 15 mins
Lock the bike and your trip will end automatically within 1 minute.
"Sorry, you can't complete this trip. Please park the bike in a permitted area then tap 'Trip Completed'."
For your safety and the safety of others, please be sure to follow all city traffic laws and regulations.
"Safety first as always. Wear a helmet while riding."
Scan the QR code in the middle of the handle to unlock.
Scan failed. Please enter the bike number.
Scan QR code on the lock to unlock bike.
This bike has a mechanical lock. Please enter the code manually using the keypad.
Please ensure you are connected to the Internet.
Scan QR code on the lock to reserve bike.
Scan failed. Please enter the bike number.

Please confirm that the scooter has been parked safely and legally and you want to end the trip now.
Press \"TRIP COMPLETED\" button in app to end the trip.
Kick start then push the throttle with right thumb to accelerate.
Squeeze the brake with left hand to slow down.
Sorry our systems are busy. Please try again later.

It takes a few seconds for the bike to unlock.
Press \"Trip Finished\" button to end trip and lock the scooter.
"Mind the Ride Range of the scooter so it won't run out of battery during your ride."
Safety first. Always wear a helmet while riding.

Sorry, top 3 scooters for one deployment.

Share this ride with your friends!
You haven’t taken any trips. Start riding now!
For your safety, please turn on the front and rear lights before using this bike. If the lights are not working, please report the problem and use a different bike.
Your ofo account is not connected to a Facebook account. You can sign into a Facebook account in the Settings menu.
Unable to obtain your location. Please ensure map use is enabled and try again.

Please install the Twitter app and try again.

Sorry! Usernames can only contain letters, numbers and underscores.
Sorry! Your username must be 3-15 characters long.
Please check your network and try again.
